channel.title: Why is every topic being locked?
channel.description:
Guys, well, new moderators, ease it up with the locking. Half of the topics that have been locked in the RS2 server tutorial board shouldn't be locked.
I mean, they can't post Java tutorials, they can't post teaching tutorials, they can't post copy and paste tutorials (I agree), they can't post any tutorials. One in particular was locked, and it was a well written tutorial, explaining the Graphics method, why?

item.title: Why is every topic being locked?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:14, topic:204714”]You people are acting like total pricks, if someone disagreed with you being a moderator or getting a certain position on this forum then openly came out telling everyone why they thought you don’t deserve that position. I can imagine ``jason feels like shit after reading this.[/quote]Agreed. You guys have to calm down.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is every topic being locked?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Tree:

Staff members should be chosen for their moderating ability, maturity and knowledge. It seems that the admins forget that. You wonder why this community fails.

Ok, name 3 mscpers that have good moderating abilities, that are mature and knowledgeable, show good interest in private servers and aren’t already staff, and I’ll demod ``jason.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is every topic being locked?

item.title: Why is every topic being locked?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:8, topic:204714”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=270246.msg2218811#msg2218811 date=1210428506]

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,269837.0.html

Probably isn’t the best example, but it still shouldn’t of been locked in my opinion.
[/quote]Sorry but since when has posting a tutorial that basically changes 4 numbers? point out to me how it could be useful and ill unlock it and apologise to the poster

Ohk, with a little tweaking that could be a good tutorial. That was the first one that I saw, so I posted it. Still, it is showing how to change graphical features of the server.[/quote]
With a little tweaking? So at the time of post it was unfit. The end.

Greeny, continuing your post:

[21:21] TeleNubby: Could I ask [21:21] TeleNubby: Why ``jason was a good choice? [21:22] Niall: looking back I don't know why I nominated him in the first place, but he has a good attitude and as long as he can lock topics for being in the wrong place he'll do [21:23] TeleNubby: thats true but [21:23] TeleNubby: have you noticed [21:23] TeleNubby: his first REAL post on MSCP was after he got mod? [21:24] Niall: I noticed a few posts, I don't expect him to be like Yz85 and spew out really helpful posts, I just expect him to lock a few topics here and there to relieve the load on other mods [21:25] TeleNubby: alrighty then [21:25] TeleNubby: but I might add [21:25] TeleNubby: a few staff members are a lil' iffy on that [21:28] Niall: I might regret it, but no one is denying that mscp needs mods [21:29] TeleNubby: alright [21:29] TeleNubby: its youre choice in the end [21:29] Niall: the only real damage he can do is delete/move a load of topics and edit a load of posts, the former can be fixed in a few seconds

Also, isnt it a good thing the rules are actually being enforced for a first time?

Read full topic

item.title: Why is every topic being locked?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Yz85Racer:

I am aware of that, but I still think if it teaches how to utilize the Java language, and provides a way and why it should be used in the server, I have no problem with it. Half of the ones I went through were teaching tutorials, and they were locked.

I havn’t been moderating today but if you could kinda show me a teaching one other than the java one that should be in the java section, Because I have not seen a moparscape tutorial actually teach in ages.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is every topic being locked?

item.title: Why is every topic being locked?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Why? Because majority of the other mods are complete morons. It’s almost like the staff spin a bottle and pick the idiot who it lands on. Jason is a prime example of this. Though i have nothing against him as a person, he is completely unfit for this staff position. Why? He was banned from irc for abusing another irc network and begging for an award of some sorts. That was the day before his got his powers. Excellent choice there.

Staff members should be chosen for their moderating ability, maturity and knowledge. It seems that the admins forget that. You wonder why this community fails.

Read full topic
